bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Functional Specification of Transmission Static Var Compensators
IEEE Draft Guide for the Functional Specification of Transmission Static Var Compensators

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide documents an approach to preparing a specification for a transmission static var compensator. The document is intended to serve as a base specification with an informative annex provided to allow users to modify or develop specific clauses to meet a particular application.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
